title: Retirement Advisor: Rob Isbitts On ‘Tapping The Brakes’ Before Retirement
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Financial advisor Rob Isbitts of Sungarden Investment Management, based in Weston, Florida, defines his style as “aggressive capital preservation.” In this podcast (19:33), the veteran advisor, and publisher of advisor site TheHedgedInvestor.com, keeps the focus on remaining humble, which he characterizes as balancing reward and risk at all times. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
